text: , also known as NYK Line, is one of the largest shipping companies in the world.NYK Line, "About" ; retrieved 2012-9-5. It is a core Mitsubishi company. The company has its headquarters in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan.NYK, Tokyo (Headquarters) ; retrieved on 2012-9-5. ==History== The company history began with the Tsukumo Shokai shipping company which was founded by the Tosa clan in 1870. ==Related pages== * List of container transport fleets ==References== ==Other websites== *Company website (in English) *NYK Group official history Category:Transport companies of Japan
title: Nippon Yusen
